vsParam:
Why all the noise... What's wrong, Peppermint?
I can't believe you brought humans here...

S-sorry, your Majesty!
But it's urgent!

Humph... I think it's probably because of the dragon
which is disrupting the human world.

It doesn't bother me at all as long as
the dragon poses no threat to Fairyland.

Come on, Lord Thunbergia.
Think twice, OK?

The fact that Peppermint came all way to ask for your help
shows that we fairies are also under threat.

Y-yes! Fairies outside Fairyland
might be attacked anytime!

Exactly. This problem isn't exclusive to
the human world... What do you think?

Humph... But they can't do anything. In front of
that dragon, humans are too weak to do anything.
Th-that's why we're here to ask for your help...

Yes. We may stand a chance of winning
if we could seal that dragon's magic power! So, please...

"Child of Vita"... The super magic power
in you comes from that dragon?

Huh? Oh, you mean this scale?
Yeah, it's from the dragon!

So, it means...
There is a way to seal that dragon's magic power.
Really!? Could you please enlighten us...

But it's barely feasible.
Anyway... as a starter, you need to do make that thing.

"Child of Vita", show your power. If your alchemy
is not good enough yet, then everything is off the table.

Oh... Huh? What kind of item is it? I haven't quite got
it, but [px], we're relying on you!
